alert.note: Alert for Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 4:53AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Gusty thunderstorms will impact portions of Passaic, Union, northwestern Bergen, Essex and Rockland Counties through 545 AM EDT... At 452 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Highland Lake to near Martinsville. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newark, Paterson, Elizabeth, Wayne, Plainfield, Bloomfield, Orange, West Milford, Summit, Millburn, Ramsey, Ringwood, Pompton Lakes, Suffern and Caldwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
